java.lang.Runnable, java.rmi.Remote, JdbcOperation, Transaction, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.MessageKeys, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.RemoteTags, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.RemoteTagsComponent, org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Diagnostics, org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Liveness, org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Prim, org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Update, org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference.RemoteReferenceResolver, org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference.RemoteReferenceResolverHelper
public class CounterTransactionImpl
extends TransactionImpl

This component subclasses TransactionImpl to run the transactions at startup, and the transactions listed in counterCommands on termination It can be used as a counterpoint to any components that create tables and the like created 28-Nov-2006 14:47:56

Method Detail

sfStart

public void sfStart()
             throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException,
                    java.rmi.RemoteException
The startup operation is to read the commands in then execute them by way of TransactionImpl.executeStartupCommands(). Subclasses may change this behaviour

Specified by:
sfStart in interface org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Prim
Overrides:
sfStart in class TransactionImpl
Throws:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException - for smartfrog problems
java.rmi.RemoteException - for network problems.

protected void runTerminationCommands()
                               throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException,
                                      java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                      java.sql.SQLException
Override point: termination commands. All exceptions should be caught and printed here.

java.rmi.RemoteException - network problems
java.sql.SQLException - SQL problems

hasTerminationCommands

Override point: Return true if the component has termination time SQL commands to run

true if there are counterCommands.
